hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.
